body.p: Born on August 4, 1833 in Kentucky. Appointed Postmaster of Blandville, Kentucky on December 7, 1858. His occupation in 1860 is listed as clk and stone in Blandville, Kentucky. He died on February 5, 1903 in Blandville, Kentucky.
